talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Guard Chiffe$
(Chiffe suddenly turns serious and thinks for a while.)
<html>$Army of DestructionIV$</html>

$Guard Chiffe$
It may sound absurd to you but I was wondering if there's a way I can become a Child.

$Guard Chiffe$
Yeah, what I realised after seeing the battle between the Childs and the Army of Destruction in Wasteland Battlefield was that humans can never win them.

$Guard Chiffe$
So in order to become close to the Childs, I have no choice but to become a Child myself.

$Guard Chiffe$
The Childs are the Children of Darkness created by Goddess Vestinel, and an evolved form of the Beyond Dragon. But how are they born as Childs? Why has no one seen how a Child is born?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Did the Beyond Dragon polymorph only into humans?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Guard Chiffe$
Besides, the essence of all the Childs is the same Beyond Dragon isn't it? Then how come the polymorphs of it are not only humans but various creatures?

$Guard Chiffe$
Female humans look most similar to the goddess, that's why most of the Oracles are female humans. Maybe that's why the children of the goddess, or the Beyond Dragon, are all in human form.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Is there a reason for being possessed?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Guard Chiffe$
Then why is it that Childs, who are the evolved form of the Beyond Dragon, polymorph into different forms and not only humans? Could it be that the evolution they talk about is actually a fusion with the creatures in this world? Or could it be that they are being possessed by the Beyond Dragon like how The Oracle is possessed by the goddess?!

$Guard Chiffe$
Well, gods are too big to enter the world they've created so they need to squash themselves inside a human shell. But Beyond Dragon was created to be a part of this world in the first place so there's no reason why they should do that.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Could there be a secret in how the Childs are born?)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Guard Chiffe$
The priests told me that if normal people find out about the birth of Childs, the Anti-Goddess Faction may murder the weak Childs who had just been born and many problems might occur in the process. So it's better to keep it a secret.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(So it's different from the jewels of dragons in Lagendia...)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Guard Chiffe$
Some Child Followers tried to eat or absorb a Child's jewel but that didn't work. I think the goddess doesn't allow anyone else but the Childs to have a dragon's jewel.

$Guard Chiffe$
Anyways, I want to become a Child no matter what! So…….
Actually I did some research on my own.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Could he be one of the soldiers who are searching for me?!)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Guard Chiffe$
I have an acquaintance who is a Soldier of Destruction under Lord Tryan. He's in Merca right now.

$Guard Chiffe$
So I asked him about how Childs are created and he said it would be hard for him to bring documents out and asked me to come and take them instead if I really needed them.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You mean it's not you but I who would be going…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Guard Chiffe$
So I told him that I'd go and take it myself. You've been to Tryan's Territory.

$Guard Chiffe$
Well, he gave me this key so you can find the documents when you open a box in Tryan's Territory.

$Guard Chiffe$
You've been there once, of course you can go there twice. Go to Tryan's Territory now.

$Guard Chiffe$
Wow so this is the document that holds the secret of the amazing Childs!!
(Chiffe snatches the document from your hands and reads it quickly.)

$Guard Chiffe$
Eh... It says "...most of the Childs don't know how they were created. Though there are cases of sparse random memories, most of them forget their past entirely as time passes as if it was intended..."

$Guard Chiffe$
"My hypothesis is that since the goddess was rather temperamental in the creation of this world in the first place, she might be neglecting the Childs after creating them in various shapes and forms. However, it is still questionable..."

$Guard Chiffe$
"...why the confusion of memory exists in many of the early occurrences of Childs. It is as if the Childs have a past of their own before becoming a Child and their memories were wiped out like they are something that should not be revealed."

$Guard Chiffe$
Ah, I don't know. All it's saying is that it's better not to know about how the Childs occur. But it still must be a controversial document since it was not allowed to be taken outside Lord Tryan's territory.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(There's nothing good about being a Child.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Guard Chiffe$
I guess I won't know how Childs are formed forever...
Well, the core of a dragon is a jewel but I can't even absorb or attain a jewel in the first place. There's no hope for me!

$Guard Chiffe$
Anyway, thanks for the hard work.
Let's quit trying to become a Child and focus on joining the Army of Destruction instead!
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

$Guard Chiffe$
Right, we have a bright future ahead. Hahahahaha!!
(It looks like he can't hear what you say.)

journal.title: Talk to Guard Chiffe
journal.contents:
Guard Chiffe wants you to aim to join the Army of Destruction with him. Talk to him a little more.

Merca's Heart - Guard Chiffe
journal.destination: Talk to Guard Chiffe in Merca's Heart

journal.title: Search Tryan's Territory
journal.contents:
Guard Chiffe said he wants to know how to become a Child and asked you to find a document on how Childs occur. Go to Tryan's Territory and find the box containing the secret document.

Merca's Heart (Blue Sand Trading Route) - Tryan's Territory
journal.destination: Find the secret document at Tryan's Territory
journal.todo_msg: Find the box containing the secret document at Tryan's Territory.

journal.title: Talk to Guard Chiffe
journal.contents:
You've obtained a secret document from Tryan's Territory. Go back to Merca's Heart and pass it to Guard Chiffe.

Merca's Heart - Guard Chiffe
journal.destination: Talk to Guard Chiffe in Merca's Heart
journal.todo_msg: Go to Merca's Heart and talk to Guard Chiffe.
